title: Dalton Maag releases new typeface
content:
Dalton Maag releases its latest font family created in conjunction with the London design agency North. Co Headline and Co Text combine contemporary design with typographic functionality for which Dalton Maag fonts are renowned.

[www.daltonmaag.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015060136/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/ "www.daltonmaag.com")
author: bruno_maag
